import React, { Component } from 'react' import {Container,Row,Col,Card} from 'react-bootstrap' class CategoryLoading extends Component { render() { let isLoading = this.props.isLoading; return (

CATEGORIES

Some Of Our Exclusive Collection, You May Like

) } } export default CategoryLoading
